name: Brownie Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Swapped by Christine Tsai at the SE Cookie Swap
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup butter, cut into small chunks
3 cups (18 ounces) semi-sweet chocolate morsels, divided as described in recipe

recipeInstructions.text: Combine butter, unsweetened chocolate, and 1 1/2 cups semi-sweet chips in a large, heavy saucepan. Cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until butter and chocolate melt. Cool.
Combine flour, baking powder, and salt in a small bowl. Set aside.
Beat eggs, sugar and vanilla at medium with an electric mixer. Add dry ingredients, beating well. Add chocolate mixture, remaining chocolate chips and pecans.
Using medium cookie scoop, drop 1 inch apart onto a parchment lined baking sheet. Bake at 350°F for 10 minutes.
